retire(address).details: this also removes all authorizations in place

params.workerAddress: address of the worker to be retired

acceptJob().notice: Called by the worker to accept the job

cancelHire(address).notice: Called by the user to cancel a job offer

getOwner(address).notice: Get the owner of the worker node

getUser(address).notice: Get the user of the worker node, which may not be the owner yet, or how was the previous owner of a retired node

hire(address).notice: Asks the worker to work for the sender. Sender needs to pay something.

isAvailable(address).notice: Returns true if worker node is available

isOwned(address).notice: Returns true if worker node is owned by some user

isPending(address).notice: Returns true if worker node is pending

isRetired(address).notice: Returns true if worker node was retired by its owner

rejectJob().notice: Called by the worker to reject a job offer

retire(address).notice: Called by the user to retire his worker.
